risk_of_persecution: personalized risk due to clan affiliation or perceived wealth
evidence_assessment: documentary evidence showed generalized risks but no specific targeting of the Applicant
decision_reasoning: Officer's decision was reasonable and supported by evidence
cause_of_action: Applicant feared returning to Somalia due to clan affiliation and perceived Westernization
procedure_followed: Judicial review analyzed whether the Officer's rejection of the PRRA application was based on errors in law or fact
result_of_case: Application for judicial review dismissed; no certification of proposed question
